nodes.text: Dorn Gestros was a Human male who lived during the Galactic Civil War.

During 1 ABY, Dorn Gestros frequented the cantina in the city of Mos Espa on Tatooine. During this time, a Twi'lek named Anetia Kah'ryn tasked an entertainer with extracting information from a number of patrons, including Dorn Gestros. Anetia, a performer herself, found that patrons were more willing to divulge information after they have been entertained. Anetia desired information on criminal and Tusken activity on Tatooine, and felt Dorn Gestros might know something.

The entertainer agreed, and went to the Mos Espa cantina to perform for Gestros. After the performance, Gestros complimented the entertainer. The entertainer used this oportunity to flatter Gestros, and ask him if he knew of any information. Gestros then revealed that someone was riling up the Tuskens, and that some sort of holy site was involved. The entertainer thanked Gestros for the information, and after saying their farewells, told the information to Anetia.

Dorn Gestros is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. Prior to the so-called "New Game Enhancements" of 2005, Dorn Gestros was involved in a series of Entertainer profession quests which investigated a plot by Jabba Desilijic Tiure to have Tusken Raiders attack Mos Eisley.

Despite the quests no longer existing in the game, Dorn Gestros can still be seen standing in the Mos Espa cantina. Though he is always a Human male, his overall appearance fluctuates randomly throughout gameplay.
